description.value: Your work as an investigator makes you familiar with the criminal element. You might be a criminal yourself, or you might have gained an understanding of how they operate from the outside. You become trained in Underworld Lore, and you gain your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pursue a Lead] investigation bonus to Thievery checks to investigate a case (such as checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Steal] a clue from a suspect or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Pick a Lock] to open a safe with damning documents).
